public class PlayerStat extends Object implements Comparable<PlayerStat>

  • Field Details

    • name

      public String name
      A String of player's name. This field represent the input name from the player in EnterNameScene

  • Method Details

    • compareTo

      public int compareTo​(PlayerStat other)
      Override the the method compareTo() to use the custom comparator Comparing the PlayerStat objects by their level. If they are at the same level, compare them by their exp, and their name respectively.
      Specified by:
      compareTo in interface Comparable<PlayerStat>

    • setName

      public void setName​(String name)
      Set the correct format of name By using checkEnteredName(String name) from NameInputUtility class to check is the name is in the correct format or not, then Set the name.
